text: Ancient Region of Anatolia Pontus (Πόντος) Location North eastern Anatolia State existed: 302-64 BC Nation Leucosyri Historical capitals Amasya Famous rulers Mithridates VI Eupator Roman province Pontus Pontus () is a historical region on the southern coast of the Black Sea.
